body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       EXPLORE El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro though:  News - Look here for press releases.   Photos & Multimedia - Public domain images, videos, online exhibits, and audio files are at your fingertips.   History & Culture - Discover in-depth research, a book bibliography, a list of National Register of Historic Places, and the trail's connection to the Civil War.   Education - Teacher resources and lesson plans.   Kids & Youth - Plays and activities to enjoy.   Management - Includes laws & policies and a staff listing.
title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Learn About the Park
